Title: Object: The Horse Guards, Treasury &c.
Description: View in St James's Park looking towards the Horse Guards, in foreground to left a piece of Turkish ordnance with a soldier standing to its left; illustration to the Beauties of England and Wales. 1810 Etching and engraving
Bibliographic references: Crace 1878 / A Catalogue of Maps, Plans and Views of London, Westminster and Southwark, collected and arranged by Frederick Crace (XII.64)
Adams 1983 / London Illustrated 1604-1850: a survey and index of topographical books and their plates (104.81)
